pr_title: Issue #7505: add attention note to tables of style coverage

timeline.bodyText:
The last line is redundant if the 2nd to last line says to "always" use the one in the embedded jar.
It seems to me the one sentence isn't an always and this should be an either or. Either use the embedded jar or use a custom version copied from one that matches your checkstyle version.
timeline.author: rnveach
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -66,6 +66,13 @@

+

+ ATTENTION: + Links to config and test in following table reference to latest (not released yet) config, + it might be slightly different from what we have in latest release. + Please always use config that is embedded to jar. + Please be sure to use same version of config as your checkstyle version.

timeline.bodyText: To me these should be 2 separate sentences instead of a comma. It may help to explain what it is in the second sentence.
timeline.author: rnveach
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -66,6 +66,13 @@

+

+ ATTENTION: + Links to config and test in following table reference to latest (not released yet) config, + it might be slightly different from what we have in latest release.

replies.bodyText:
fixed.
If any other changes should be done, it would be awesome if you provide exact wording.
replies.author: romani

timeline.message: Issue #7505: add attention note to tables of style coverage
